entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who told someone that he was pleased when they were informed.

entities.name: george

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is mentioned as the one who suggested taking off Oliver's old robes and putting Ron's name on them instead.

entities.name: oliver
entities.description: Oliver is mentioned as the owner of the old robes that Katie Bell suggested giving to Ron.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is mentioned as the one who apologized for being short with Harry earlier and expressed her opinion about Ron's Quidditch skills.

relationships.description: Ron will be taking off Oliver's old robes and putting his own name on them.
Angelina apologized for being short with Harry earlier.
